lines.text: You are here to kick up some more heels, huh?

[after meeting Dorita]
That hat! I'd better watch my lampshades and bell-cords!

[singing]
Some people say I dress too gay, but every day I feel so gay, and when I'm gay I dress that way, is something wrong with that? Noooo!

[noticing Vivian Potter for the first time]
You are beautiful!

[singing]
Oh, the polka dance, the polka dance, the polka dance is gone/But the polka dot, the polka dot, the polka dot lives on.

[inspecting lipstick on his handkerchief]
Hmm... ketchup?
No doubt. And from a Brazilian tomato.
Stop acting like Don Ameche, and get me a taxi.
I am a businessman. I go in for no foolishness. I'm entirely business.
Well old swoopy, swapping swoops at your age what have you got to say about that?
I told you darling we were simply discussing investments.
